channel.title: How do I make handlers?
channel.description:
I've been reading a lot of tutorials, and many of them don't use handlers, which i know, mean more lag, but I tried to find a tutorial on how to make handlers, but there aren't any. If you could help me out, that'd be great.
Thanks
Aksha
